summary: The League of Legends World Championship, or "Worlds," is an annual tournament where the best professional League of Legends teams compete. They fight for the title of champion, a big trophy called the Summoner's Cup, and a lot of prize money. In 2018, almost 100 million people watched the final, making it a record-breaker. The tournament is famous for its exciting games and amazing performances. It's one of the biggest and most-watched events in the world of esports, with teams from different countries playing each year. The most successful team is T1 from South Korea, with four wins.
title: League of Legends World Championship
